name: AntHalService

name: AudioFX

description: Customizable screensaver.

name: Bluetooth

description: After removal, Bluetooth won't turn on.

name: BluetoothExt
label: Bluetooth extensions

name: BluetoothMidiService
label: Bluetooth MIDI Service
description: Service used for connecting your device with musical instruments, stage lighting and other time-oriented media via Bluetooth.

name: Browser
label: Browser
description: Safe to remove as long as you install another browser.

name: Calendar
label: Calendar
description: Calendar app.

name: CalendarProvider
label: Calendar Storage
description: Syncs your phone calendar with Google Calendar. Necessary for notifications too.

name: CallLogBackup
label: Call Log Backup/Restore
description: Backup and restore your call logs (history).

name: CaptivePortalLogin
label: CaptivePortalLogin
description: A service used for displaying a special web page that is shown before using the Internet normally. Remove this if you don't use public Wi-Fi networks.

name: CarrierConfig
label: com.android.carrierconfig
description: Modifies carrier configuration.

name: CellBroadcastReceiver
label: Cell Broadcasts
description: Remove this if you don't want to receive alerts for severe and extreme threats to life and property.

name: CertInstaller
label: Certificate Installer
description: Without this, you won't be able to grant apps some special permissions and access certain files and directories.

name: CMFileManager
label: File Manager
description: Default file manager. Can be replaced by another one.

name: CMSettingsProvider
label: CM Settings Storage
description: Contains CM specific preferences in System, Secure and Global.

name: CMUpdater
label: CM Updater
description: Remove it if you are upgrading through Recovery.

name: CMWallpapers
label: CM Wallpapers
description: Remove it if you don't need the "No wallpaper" option.

name: com.qualcomm.location
label: LocationServices
description: I haven't encountered any problems after removal. Though one user reported that he lost his GPS signal upon removing this. Create a backup just in case.

name: DeskClock

name: Development

description: Tools and tests for developers.

name: DocumentsUI
label: Documents
description: Necessary for accessing Downloads app.

name: DownloadProvider
label: Download Manager
description: If removed, download functionality won't work in Google Play and the default browser. It will work in Chrome and possibly other browsers, although a notification icon in status bar might not show. If you don't use Google Play for whatever reason, you can remove this app and use another download manager.

name: DownloadProviderUi
label: Downloads
description: Downloads app.

name: Eleven
label: Music
description: Remove it if you want to use another music player.

name: Email
label: Email
description: Remove it if you don't use a local email server.
